author: Matt Burns
title: General Motors spins up global supply chain to make 50,000 face masks a day
description: GM today announced manufacturing details around building much-needed medical face masks. According to the company’s press release, it took the company less than seven days to go from nothing to producing the first production-made mask. The automotive giant sa…
